Thanks for proposing a new event!

To make it easier, here is a format to follow, so I just need to copy-paste :)

```
- title: example
  link: https://www.example.com
  dateStart: 2026-01-13
  dateEnd: 2026-01-15
  location: Best Place
  continent: Antarctica
```
